metadata.title: CVE-2016-10735 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Bootstrap 3.x before 3.4.0 and 4.x-beta before 4.0.0-beta.2, XSS ispossible in the data-target attribute, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2018-14041.

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
